title: Canadian Heritage Opulence in the Heart of Calgary with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
description:
Step into timeless elegance at Fairmont Palliser, a historic downtown icon that has set the standard for luxury in Calgary for over a century. With its grand architecture and elegant interiors, this hotel blends old-world charm with modern comfort - perfect for those seeking city sophistication while still within reach of Albertaâ€™s natural wonders, including the majestic Canadian Rockies.

Savour elevated dining at Hawthorn Dining Room & Bar, where seasonally-inspired menus and local produce shine. Stay on top of your routine at the fitness centre or unwind with a swim in the indoor pool. Relax in the hot tub or treat yourself to a rejuvenating spa experience at rnr Wellness - the perfect stop between your Calgary adventures.
